content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's focus on the rental price for now. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given that the apartment is unfurnished and in the city center, I would say 550 Euros per month would be a reasonable price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Abbasi. However, I'm looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the fact that it's unfurnished and the size is only 50 square meters, I'm willing to offer 500 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a low offer, Mr. Abbasi. I'm certain the apartment's location and proximity to amenities make it worth more. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the location and the facilities, I will offer 525 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's still not high enough, Mr. Abbasi. I'm sure I can find a tenant who appreciates the apartment's value more. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, but given the condition of the apartment, I cannot offer more than 530 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your understanding, Mr. Abbasi. However, I'm looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I have reached my maximum budget for this apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Mr. Abbasi. Let's terminate the negotiation for now.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
